title: Buy Cholamandalam Investment & Finance Company, target price Rs 820: HDFC Securities - Economic Times
content: Buy Cholamandalam Investment & Finance Company, target price Rs 820: HDFC Securities  Economic Times
description: Cholamandalam Investment & Finance Company Ltd., incorporated in the year 1978, is a Large Cap company (having a market cap of Rs 62729.89 Crore) operating in NBFC sector.
